samples.context: The body wall is made up of two layers of cells (diploblastic). Some of the species live a solitary life while others live in colonies.
samples.question: What type of cell organization do coelenterates have?

samples.context: Examples: Hydra, Jellyfish, Sea anemone, etc. The body is made up of a coelom (cavity) with a single opening.
samples.question: Name two examples of coelenterates.

samples.context: Some of the species live a solitary life while others live in colonies. The body is made up of a coelom (cavity) with a single opening.
samples.question: Do coelenterates live solitary or in colonies?
